sentences.sContent: Asshole...I should be in-charge because I get rid of your waste.
sentences.sContent_eng: Asshole...I should be in-charge because I get rid of your waste.
sentences.sCn: 忍了吧。。。） ：‘我应该负责，因为我可以摆脱掉你们所有的垃圾。’

sentences.sContent: Americans want to get rid of the deficit, they want smaller government, but they want bigger benefits from government.
sentences.sContent_eng: Americans want to get rid of the deficit, they want smaller government, but they want bigger benefits from government.
sentences.sCn: 美国人想摆脱赤字，想拥有一个更小的政府，但他们更想从政府那获得更大的好处。
